name: Hidden Journey 2: Find Objects
description:
Explore the area and start hunting for hidden objects! Hidden Journey 2: Find Objects is a new kind of seek and find games where you'll be searching for objects!
Your search will be a true pleasure with objects staying at the same positions. The adventure puzzle game to enjoy!
On each level you'll have to solve a picture puzzle: search for highlighted items and complete hidden object challenges.
Sounds quite easy, ha? We dare you to find all missing items!

Hidden Journey 2: Find Objects has tons of maps and locations, awesome graphics and hidden object art, fun minigames, bonuses and lots more.
Use your investigative skills to find an object after object on your puzzle quest.
Enjoy the simple and intuitive interface. Boost your concentration and have fun!
Easy controls will help you find hidden figures faster, as well as helpful boosters!
The best scavenger hunt game around!

Features of Hidden Journey 2: Find Objects:
- Highly-detailed, awesome graphics
- Different object finding mechanics
- Level map with unique locations
- Varieties of instruments to help your search
- Additional challenging levels
- Lots of levels with silhouettes
- Countdown timer to make the game more dynamic and immersive

Additional levels contains:
- Puzzles
- Spot the differences
- Find 10 identical items
- Pairs

Win stars to open treasure chest and find mystery prizes!

Great adventure awaits you!
